website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for a good deal on a machine that is up to most minor to mid-level tasks, this is the one.
pros: Excellent feature set for the price: helical cutter head with 2-sided inserts, tilting fence, and easy-to-operate functions
A reliable tool for most woodworkers or home hobbyists
cons: The fence isn't as sturdy as those of higher-end models
Not ideal for heavy-duty jobs, but for the budget price, you may not mind

customer_reviews.title: Excellent jointer
customer_reviews.text: I am a new woodworker and purchased this jointer based on price and reviews. It is an excellent jointer for the money. After an initial learning curve I have had nice flat faces and edges. It has limits since the width of boards I can joint is only 6”, but it serves my purposes well. This jointer paired with the Dewalt 735 planer works great for me!
customer_reviews.author: Cgraz

customer_reviews.title: It's worth the price
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what I wanted... a 6" planer that is easy to setup out of the box and use with no issues. Have run pine, maple and some oak and it's done exactly what's supposed to do. I didn't rate portability due to I unboxed it and set it up on the work table so there is no moving.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Jorgensen

customer_reviews.title: Easy blade change
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use. Easy blade change, fence should be a bit more stable. Overall works great
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Eastham

customer_reviews.title: it works great
customer_reviews.text: i have used it and it has worked great for me with no problems so far money well spent
customer_reviews.author: Sortee

customer_reviews.title: It is a great jointer/planer overall
customer_reviews.text: This machine came ready right out of the box. It was spot on, delivered excellent square cuts and its vacuum port evacuated all the chips effectively and efficiently. I am totally pleased with its performance overall.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Great jointer! Easy setup!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great jointer! I love it, the setup took 10 mins and I was able to start joining quickly!
customer_reviews.author: A&L P

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little jointer.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little jointer. Very little set up needed. Fast and responsive seller.
customer_reviews.author: Evan kelsay

customer_reviews.title: Affordable Jointer
customer_reviews.text: Jointer was easy to set up and has worked very well on cherry and oak.
customer_reviews.author: Dale H. Karweik

customer_reviews.title: Great starter jointer
customer_reviews.text: Great operation for small jointing projects. I would recommend this for any starting woodworker looking for a jointer. Make sure you have a good technique when running the word through and don’t put any downward pressure on the material.
customer_reviews.author: KmB

customer_reviews.title: This is a perfect size jointer for me
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect size jointer for me, and the price was right. The only improvement I would like to see, is a smoother finish on the bed.
customer_reviews.author: J. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Smooth operation
customer_reviews.text: Great product for my needs. The fence could be a bit stronger but is adjusted and holds well
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Not a helical head!!
customer_reviews.text: This is not a helical cutter head jointer; I bought this thinking that would be the case. It does have a segmented cutter head, which does work better than a straight knife jointer but not as well as a helical head jointer. I’ve owned a porter cable jointer and this one and this one works well however I do not believe it works as well as helical head cutter. Other than that everything else works fine but I would not have bought it if I knew it actual capabilities.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew H. Cronk

customer_reviews.title: Perfect benchtop jointer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a few months ago and my only regret is not getting the 8" version. This is a great benchtop jointer and the helical heads make nice work against hardwoods. I've ran maple, walnut, paduak, and mahogany through with no issues or tear out. The only problem i've ran into so far is the dust chute can sometimes get clogged but it's easy to pop off the cover and vacuum it out. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel E.

product_meta.title: RIKON Power Tools 20-600H 6" Benchtop Jointer with Helical Cutter head
product_meta.description: 6" Benchtop Jointer #20-600H has a 6 row helical-style cutter head with 12 HSS, 2-edge insert cutters for super cutting action, flat surfacing results and easy knife changes. Features rigid, all-metal construction, machined aluminum tables, a quick depth setting mechanism with scale, adjustable fence that tilts from 90° to 45° quickly and accurately, spring-loaded safety guard, 2-1/2" dust port, front safety on/off switch and two push blocks.
feature_bullets: RIKON BENCHTOP JOINTER - This 6” becnhtop jointer has a 6 row helical-style cutter head with 12 HSS, 2-insert cutters for super cutting action.

ALL STEEL CONSTRUCTION - Made from rigid, all-metal construction, machined aluminum tables, a quick depth setting mechanism with scale, adjustable fence that tilts from 90 degrees to 45 degrees quickly and accurately.
SEE RESULTS - This benchtop jointer also has a spring loaded safety guard and a front on/off switch. You will see results when using this benchtop jointer.
HIGH SPEED - With a powerful 10 AMP motor, this benchtop jointer also features a high speed steel insert knives and a large 30” x6-3/16” table.

specifications.Included Components: 12 double edge inserts cutters, Two Push Blocks, Hex Wrenches, Manual, 6" Jointer
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars29 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
